mapper.sql: lc_low_main_page.id, lc_low_main_page.page_title AS pageTitle, lc_low_main_page.page_name AS pageName, lc_low_main_page.column_align AS columnAlign, lc_low_main_page.api_endpoint AS apiEndpoint, lc_low_main_page.form_add_title AS formAddTitle, lc_low_main_page.form_view_title AS formViewTitle, lc_low_main_page.form_edit_title AS formEditTitle, lc_low_main_page.content_layout AS contentLayout, lc_low_main_page.content_items AS contentItems, lc_low_main_page.content_item_container_style AS contentItemContainerStyle, lc_low_main_page.list_fields AS listFields, lc_low_main_page.list_operation_fields AS listOperationFields, lc_low_main_page.form_add_fields AS formAddFields, lc_low_main_page.form_view_fields AS formViewFields, lc_low_main_page.form_edit_fields AS formEditFields, lc_low_main_page.form_default_content_layout AS formDefaultContentLayout, lc_low_main_page.form_default_width AS formDefaultWidth ,lc_low_main_page.page_min_width AS pageMinWidth ,lc_low_main_page.search_type AS searchType ,lc_low_main_page.search_button_type AS searchButtonType ,lc_low_main_page.front_url
mapper.select: SELECT lc_low_main_page.* FROM lc_low_main_page WHERE lc_low_main_page.id=#{id} GROUP BY lc_low_main_page.id

SELECT
FROM lc_low_main_page
WHERE 1=1
AND lc_low_main_page.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.id},'%')
AND lc_low_main_page.page_title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.pageTitle},'%')
AND lc_low_main_page.page_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.pageName},'%')
AND lc_low_main_page.column_align LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.columnAlign},'%')
AND lc_low_main_page.api_endpoint LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.apiEndpoint},'%')
AND lc_low_main_page.form_add_title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.formAddTitle},'%')
AND lc_low_main_page.form_view_title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.formViewTitle},'%')
AND lc_low_main_page.form_edit_title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.formEditTitle},'%')
AND lc_low_main_page.content_layout LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.contentLayout},'%')
AND lc_low_main_page.content_items LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.contentItems},'%')
AND lc_low_main_page.content_item_container_style LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.contentItemContainerStyle},'%')
AND lc_low_main_page.list_fields LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.listFields},'%')
AND lc_low_main_page.list_operation_fields LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.listOperationFields},'%')
AND lc_low_main_page.form_add_fields LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.formAddFields},'%')
AND lc_low_main_page.form_view_fields LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.formViewFields},'%')
AND lc_low_main_page.form_edit_fields LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.formEditFields},'%')
AND lc_low_main_page.form_default_content_layout LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.formDefaultContentLayout},'%')
AND lc_low_main_page.page_min_width LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.page_min_width},'%')
AND lc_low_main_page.form_default_width LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.formDefaultWidth},'%')
AND lc_low_main_page.search_type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.searchType},'%')
AND lc_low_main_page.search_button_type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.searchButtonType},'%')
AND lc_low_main_page.start_time >= DATE(#{startTime})
AND lc_low_main_page.end_time <= DATE(#{endTime}

SELECT
FROM lc_low_main_page
WHERE 1=1
AND lc_low_main_page.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.id},'%')
AND lc_low_main_page.page_title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.pageTitle},'%')
AND lc_low_main_page.start_time >= DATE(#{startTime})
AND lc_low_main_page.end_time <= DATE(#{endTime}
